What is this Command-Line Course?

Command-Line Course KIK-LG218 is an online course at the University of Helsinki. The idea of the course is to teach students to operate and navigate in the UNIX environment. The course consists of weekly quizzes which go through the basic commands and tasks one should know when working with code, programming, language technology etc.

Hosted on GitHub Pages — Theme by orderedlist
